basics.name: Bastián Núñez
basics.label: Software Engineer with a year experience developing front end web applications and games.
basics.summary: I am a proactive software engineer skilled in front-end web development and game creation. My diverse experiences have sharpened my creativity, adaptability, attention to detail, and teamwork abilities. I am passionate about continuous learning, problem-solving, and quickly mastering new skills. With a strong track record of delivering results and overcoming challenges, I am eager to bring my dedication and expertise to a dynamic team.

work.name: OAK Software GmbH
work.summary: Through in-depth security analysis of a web application, potential vulnerabilities were identified and promptly addressed, resulting in enhanced application resilience, reduced security risks, and increased user confidence. Extensive research on web topics and security protocols was conducted, with findings leveraged to implement effective solutions and optimize application performance.
highlights: Satisfied every assignment, demonstrating efficiency, proactivity and good communication.

volunteer.summary: Elected by the majority of university students as student representative to advocate on their behalf to the organization's authorities, organize student activities, and resolve potential issues.
highlights: Enhanced communication, teamwork, and leadership skills

awards.title: Top 2 in Career
awards.summary: Award for achieve top 2 on academical performance

projects.name: SpaceX Launches
projects.description: Simple Astro application made with Tailwind and Typescript that consumes SpaceX API and shows the latest launches and their information

projects.name: Automated Crop System
projects.description: This system uses multiple sensors to monitor air humidity, soil moisture, light intensity, and temperature, with data processed by an Arduino micro controller and transmitted via WiFi to an Android app. Users can view crop information, receive environmental alerts, and adjust settings to control lights, irrigation, and ventilation through the app. A PHP-based web server supports data collection and user management. The primary goal is to improve crop production, automate cultivation tasks, and reduce costs by minimizing unnecessary resource use.
highlights: Best project and performance as final Thesis

projects.name: Space Shooter Game
projects.description: The project entails the creation of a 2D space-themed game wherein players pilot a spaceship through the cosmos, engaging in combat with diverse adversaries. This endeavor showcases essential gaming mechanics and allows for artistic expression via music composition and visual artwork. Developed in C# using the Unity game engine, the project incorporates storytelling elements to enrich the gaming experience
